sentences.sContent: By mid-morning, the temperature was already above 100 degrees Fahrenheit.
sentences.sCn: 到上午10点左右，气温已超过华氏100度了。

trans.tranOther: Fahrenheit is a scale for measuring temperature, in which water freezes at 32 degrees and boils at 212 degrees. It is represented by the symbol °F.
a scale of temperature in which water freezes at 32˚ and boils at 212˚
